text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi allahace sahayyaka bana,1 jyapramane (hajarata) mariyamace putra (hajarata) isa yanni havarinna (mitranna) sangitale, kona ahe jo allahacya margata majha madatanisa banela? (Tyance) mitra mhanale ki, amhi allahacya margata madatanisa ahota. Tevha isra'ilacya santatipaiki eka gatane tara imana rakhale ani eka gatane kupra (inkara) kela,2 tara amhi imana rakhanaryanna tyancya satruncya
